description: black silhouettes of woman (with edges of head covering and apron in white) pulling on a rope tied to a donkey, with a boy pushing on the back end of the donkey; three personified trees in background, with two elves wearing red caps looking on from on top of the tree at right
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

on back, LRC: [C238]
medium: Pen and ink and watercolor (?) on card
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Bob Hogan, Albuquerque, NM
title: Untitled [woman and boy with donkey, personified trees and two elves]
